This menu contains editing tools to make changes to the whiteboard
Tap on the game object to add it to the whiteboard\n\nTo remove any object on the field, drag it to the very top left corner
Tap to change the pen color between black, blue, and red
This menu is used to set team numbers and their shapes. Shapes are used to represent the different types of robots

Long press on the number "1", "2", "3" will prompt for the team number

Long press on the shape will change the shape type (eg. square, circle, etc.)

A quick tap will add the team shape and number to the whiteboard
This menu has action tools for the whiteboard
Tap to type up notes for the match strategy
Tap to remove the last stroke or field object on the whiteboard
Tap to reset the whiteboard to a clean state
You can always tap here to view this tutorial again
The menu\'s visibility can be toggled by double tapping anywhere on the screen
